revised_title: Analysis of Sydneia or Terra Australis Earthy Substance
tldr: The author, Charles Hatchett, examines an earthy substance from New South Wales called Sydneia or Terra Australis. He analyzes the substance using various acids and reagents, finding that it contains siliceous earth, alumine, and iron. The existence of this primitive earth remains uncertain, and further analysis is needed to determine its true nature.
